channel.title: Chrashing server
channel.description: everytime i spawn any infinity mage armour fury ammy d 2h fire cape and so on my server as soon as a i hit enter to send, after it doesn't respond i then cant log on that account anymore because it logs me out straight away any help would be much appreaciated peace :D

item.title: Chrashing server

item.description:
@undeadscape_owner wrote:

lol thanks for ur help but i’ve had in total 3 sources and they all crashed when spawning those items … thanks for ur time anyway i appreciate it my server is 80% complete i’ve had a total of about 7 people i know going and testing it and they said it would be even better with fury fire capes ect. might have to change my source agian :S lol what fun!!

item.title: Chrashing server
item.dc:creator: @exe626 exe626
item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

Eh Pretty Easy:

Omfg… that has nothing to do why it crashes. Some items DO NOT EXIST on different sources.

Dude,
Even if it says ‘NOT EXISTING ITEM’
You can still use it.
its just not found in your item.cfg…

++IT HAS NO BONUSES LIKE THAT. :s

item.title: Chrashing server
item.dc:creator: @exe626 exe626
item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

Weird.
it looks just like mines :s
else if (command.startsWith(“pickup”) && (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“admin”) || playerRights >= 1)) {
try {
int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,11));
int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(12));
if (/*newItemID <= 10000 && */newItemID >= 0) {
addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
} else {
sendMessage(“No such item.”);
}
} catch(Exception e) {
sendMessage(“Wrong Syntax! Use as ::pickup 0995 10”);
}[br][size=1]Posted on: February 16, 2007, 04:38:15 AM[/size][hr]All I could say is your source sucks, get a new one, k?
